title: Profile
description: Profiles are overlays on event classes and objects, effectively a dynamic mix-in class of attributes with their requirements and constraints.

annotations.description: Annotations for this profile describing categories it belongs in.

caption.description: A short, human friendly name for the profile.

description.description: A concise description of the profile.

extends.description: A profile that this one extends from.

meta.description: A value indicating the type of this profile.

name.description: A name of the profile. It must be a unique name. The name is all lower case letters, combine words using underscore.

attributes.description: A dictionary of attributes for the profile.

$include.description: A reference to another schema for attributes to include.
